txt.en: Protecting the large geode from dwarf-wight miners.
You have been tasked with protecting a large geode in Gundabad from dwarf-wight miners.
Destroy the Angmarim wards to halt the dwarf-wights ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow the geode to be destroyed</rgb>
'Great work, [placeholder]! You were able to protect the geode from the Angmarim necromancy! Let us return to HÃ³rin and report of your success!'
